Attributes.description: Ethical considerations, intention-to-treat versus efficacy trials, principles of sampling and exclusion, methods of allocation and techniques of randomization, parallel versus cross over design, monitoring treatment outcomes, adverse effects, stopping rules, analytic techniques and data interpretation, and logistical issues in the management of clinical trials.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: Either (a) one of HCEP 502, HCEP 513 or (b) one of SPPH 502, SPPH 513.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Days: Tue, Start Time: 9:30, End Time: 12:30, Building: Forest, Room: Sciences
